text: Hi there folks. I have a couple of connected apps created, they haven't been verified. We want to convert one of them to a private app, how to do that?

Hi Gaia, at the moment we do not offer streamlined pathway for converting a public app to a private app. You also note that there is not direct feature compatibility between public and private apps so some of the existing features of your app might not be able to be recreated in a private app.
We have a couple documents that help explain the differences <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/guides/apps/overview#types-of-apps>
